page.title: 14SPRINGHEAD BOWLING GREEN
page.content: Interview from Mr.Lawrence by Claire Drewery and Helen Yates. About 50 years ago from Willerby Road to Carr lane was a very big farm.Then in 1930 it was made into a golf course and the old farmhouse was changed into the club house.At the same time a bowling club was built,a pavillion with two greens in front of it.The park area and some tennis courts. The prices to go on the tennis courts or bowling greens are: BOWLS adults - 23p half hour. children - 12p half hour. TENNIS - 22p half hour. The greatest difficulty of being a groundsman is floods with rain,ice and snow,no work can be done then. There is no age limit so anyone can play bowls.It is not a private club,anyone can go there.
